main event: On October 1, 1956, near Castle AFT, Merced, California, a sighting of a bright light or glow was observed for approximately 5 seconds. The object then appeared to climb back into the clouds. Another sighting lasting 15 seconds followed, suggesting it could have been a searchlight or an aircraft but insufficient data was available for analysis.
interesting points: The initial sighting lasted about 5 seconds, with the object climbing back into the clouds.
A second sighting occurred for 15 seconds, indicating the possible presence of a searchlight or aircraft.
The object was described as oval-shaped, light in color, and brilliantly lighted.
The direction of travel was noted as northeast at a slow speed, with an estimated distance of 12 to 15 miles and elevation of 12 to 15 degrees.
A follow-up message requested responsible investigation of the UFO sighting, with details classified.
